title: Easy One Cup Slice
abstract:
YUM!
This was so incredibly simple to make, absolutely delicious to eat, and fantastic to have as a quick put-together, up-your-sleeve nibble if you’ve got visitors or an upcoming morning or afternoon tea.
We’ve chosen to freeze most of the batch, if only to save our waistlines!
ingredients:
•	1 cup of sugar
•	1 cup of Self Raising Flour
•	1 cup of coconut
•	1 cup of any dried fruit, nuts, choc bits 			you have on hand (any combination)
•	1 egg
•	½ cup of milk
•	120g butter, melted
method:
Mix dry ingredients together.
Add the beaten egg, milk, and melted butter. 
Mix well and spread evenly into lined and greased slice tin. 
Bake at 180ºC for 25-30mins
Sliced when cooled.
Enjoy!
